data.name: Microsoft
data.description: PicNet is a certified Microsoft partner and solution provider with demonstrated competencies in application development, data analytics, cloud platform and cloud productivity.

data.name: IBM

data.name: Amazon
data.description: PicNet is a part of the Amazon Web Services Partner Network (APN) as a Consulting Partner to help you expand and scale your business on AWS and accelerate your journey to the cloud.

data.name: NSW Goverment
data.description: PicNet is registered as an Advanced Supplier under the NSW Government's ICT Services Scheme (SCM0020). This scheme is a whole-of-government mandated arrangement to assist NSW Government agencies and other eligible buyers in procuring ICT related goods and services.
